DEFINITION:
The reflection of cosmic patterns in individual components

BLUEPRINT DETAILS:
Individual SPRs reflect the patterns of the entire knowledge tapestry

EXAMPLE APPLICATION:
Each SPR embodies the principles of the whole system

CATEGORY: HermeticPrinciple

RELATIONSHIPS:
type: HermeticPrinciple; reflects: Cosmic patterns; manifests: Individual components; supports: System harmony; confidence: high
